enabled = true function onButton1Down(mouse) if not enabled then return end

r = game:service("RunService") debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local damage = 5 local held_damage = 5 local slash_damage = 10 local spark_color = Color3.new(0, 1, 1)
sword = script.Parent.Handle Tool = script.Parent
local SlashSound = Instance.new("Sound") SlashSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11998777" SlashSound.Pitch = 1 SlashSound.Volume = 1 SlashSound.Parent = sword
local ClashSound = Instance.new("Sound") ClashSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=44463749" ClashSound.Pitch = 1 ClashSound.Volume = .7 ClashSound.Parent = sword
local UnsheathSound = Instance.new("Sound") UnsheathSound.SoundId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=11998796" UnsheathSound.Pitch = 1 UnsheathSound.Volume = 1 UnsheathSound.Parent = sword
function waitForChild(parent, childName) local child = parent:findFirstChild(childName) if child then return child end while true do child = parent.ChildAdded:wait() if child.Name==childName then return child end end end
-- declarations
local Figure = Tool.Parent local hum = nil
while Figure == nil or Figure.Name == "BackPack" or hum == nil do Figure = Tool.Parent if Figure ~= nil then hum = Figure:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end wait(1) end
local Torso = waitForChild(Figure, "Torso") local RightShoulder = waitForChild(Torso, "Right Shoulder") local initialShoulderFrame = nil --local LeftShoulder = waitForChild(Torso, "Left Shoulder") --local RightHip = waitForChild(Torso, "Right Hip") --local LeftHip = waitForChild(Torso, "Left Hip") --local Neck = waitForChild(Torso, "Neck") --local Humanoid = waitForChild(Figure, "Humanoid") --local SwordAngle = waitForChild(sword, "SwordAngle") --local SwordC1 = waitForChild(sword, "SwordC1")
-- ANIMATION --local downLeftPose = waitForChild(Tool, "downLeftTest") --local downRightPose = waitForChild(Tool, "downrightTest") local downLeftPose = waitForChild(Tool, "DL") local downRightPose = waitForChild(Tool, "DR") local upRightPose = waitForChild(Tool, "UR") local middlePose = waitForChild(Tool, "M") local upLeftPose = waitForChild(Tool, "upleftTest")
local dL = nil local dR = nil local uR = nil local M = nil local uL = nil local prev = nil
print("Got past the intro!")
function blow(hit)
--if (Tool.Enabled) then return end -- only damages on a swing
if hit == nil or hit.Parent == nil then return end
local humanoid = hit.Parent:findFirstChild("Humanoid") local vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil then return end local vPlayer = game.Players:playerFromCharacter(vCharacter) local hum = vCharacter:findFirstChild("Humanoid") -- non-nil if tool held by a character if humanoid~=nil and humanoid ~= hum and hum ~= nil then -- final check, make sure sword is in-hand
local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) wait(1) untagHumanoid(humanoid) end end elseif humanoid == nil and hum ~= nil then if hit.Parent.Name == "LaserSword" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent if humanoid ~= nil then humanoid = humanoid:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil then -- hit an enemy laserSword which is being held by an opponent, so make sure our sword is in-hand local right_arm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if (right_arm ~= nil) then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if (joint ~= nil and (joint.Part0 == sword or joint.Part1 == sword)) then if damage > held_damage then ClashSound.Pitch = .5 + math.random()*.5 ClashSound:Play() end
--prev:Stop(.2) if prev ~= nil then prev:Stop() if M ~= nil and prev ~= M then M:Play(.4) prev = M end damage = held_damage end
-- stop sword's motion! produce sparks too! :D -- sparks here: tempSparks = sword:FindFirstChild("LaserSwordSparks") if tempSparks == nil then tempSparks = Instance.new("Sparkles") tempSparks.Color = spark_color tempSparks.Parent = sword debris:AddItem(tempSparks, .5) end
end end end end end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local creator_tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator_tag.Value = player creator_tag.Name = "creator" creator_tag.Parent = humanoid end
function untagHumanoid(humanoid) if humanoid ~= nil then local tag = humanoid:findFirstChild("creator") if tag ~= nil then tag.Parent = nil end end end
Tool.Enabled = true local waitCount = 0 function onActivated() if not Tool.Enabled then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local character = Tool.Parent; local humanoid = character.Humanoid if humanoid == nil then print("Humanoid not found") Tool.Enabled = true return end
local head = character:FindFirstChild("Head") if head == nil then print("Head not found") Tool.Enabled = true return end
local selector = 0 local targetPos = humanoid.TargetPoint local attackVector = head.CFrame:vectorToObjectSpace(targetPos - head.Position) if attackVector.y > 0 then selector = selector + 2 end -- ups are later if attackVector.x < 0 then selector = selector + 1 end -- rights are odd
print(attackVector)
if prev ~= nil then if selector == 0 and prev ~= dL then prev:Stop() dL:Play(.2) prev = dL waitCount = 2 damage = slash_damage SlashSound.Pitch = .9 + math.random()*.25 SlashSound:Play() elseif selector == 1 and prev ~= dR then prev:Stop() dR:Play(.2) prev = dR waitCount = 2 damage = slash_damage SlashSound.Pitch = .9 + math.random()*.25 SlashSound:Play() elseif selector == 2 and prev ~= uL then prev:Stop() uL:Play(.2) prev = uL waitCount = 2 damage = slash_damage SlashSound.Pitch = .9 + math.random()*.25 SlashSound:Play() elseif selector == 3 and prev ~= uR then prev:Stop() uR:Play(.2) prev = uR waitCount = 2 damage = slash_damage SlashSound.Pitch = .9 + math.random()*.25 SlashSound:Play() end end
print(selector)
Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() damage = held_damage Figure = Tool.Parent hum = Figure:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hum == nil then print("could not find humanoid!") return end
-- give 'em the animations dL = hum:LoadAnimation(downLeftPose) dR = hum:LoadAnimation(downRightPose) uR = hum:LoadAnimation(upRightPose) M = hum:LoadAnimation(middlePose) uL = hum:LoadAnimation(upLeftPose)
prev = M
UnsheathSound.Pitch = .5 + math.random()*.5 UnsheathSound:Play()
Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=43960368" Tool.RisingBlade.Transparency = .5
Tool.FlashyScript.Disabled = true Tool.RisingBlade.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1,1,1)
for i = 1, 15 do Tool.RisingBlade.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5,1.5,0.1*i) Tool.Handle.LaserBladeWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,0.1*i - 1.5)) wait(.05) if prev == nil then return end end
if prev == M then waitCount = 0 M:Play(.2) SlashSound.Pitch = .5 + math.random()*.5 SlashSound:Play() end
Tool.FlashyScript.Disabled = false
--UnsheathSound:play() end
function onUnequipped() damage = held_damage if prev ~= nil then prev:Stop() prev = nil end if dL ~= nil then dL:Stop() end if uL ~= nil then uL:Stop() end if uR ~= nil then uR:Stop() end if dR ~= nil then dR:Stop() end if M ~= nil then M:Stop() end
ClashSound:Stop() UnsheathSound:Stop() SlashSound:Stop()
Tool.Handle.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=43645306" end
script.Parent.Activated:connect(onActivated) script.Parent.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) script.Parent.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
connection = sword.Touched:connect(blow)
-- reset to M position after a few seconds of inactivity while true do if waitCount > 0 then waitCount = waitCount - 1 if waitCount == 0 and prev ~= M and prev ~= nil then SlashSound.Pitch = .5 + math.random()*.5 SlashSound:Play()
damage = held_damage prev:Stop() M:Play(.2) prev = M end end wait(2) end
local i = 0 local delta = 0 while true do if i <= 0 then delta = .1 end if i >= 1 then delta = -.1 end script.Parent.RisingBlade.Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(1-i,1-i,1) wait(.1) i = i + delta end
